life_date: Francisco José de Goya y Lucientes, Spanish, 1746–1828
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, March 30, 2010, lot 28 (two Goya prints), for £3,500 GBP, to Laube; [August Laube, Zurich, 2010; sold to French collector]; Private collection, France (2010-11; sold to Laube); [August Laube, Zurich, 2011, sold to MIA]
title: El Mismo vuelca un Toro en la Plaza de Madrid, plate 16 from Tauromaquia
